title: It is suggested that SWH systems of the capacity of about 100 liters per day on thermosyphon with necessary electrical back-up be installed at residential buildings like hostels
clause_text: It is suggested that SWH systems of the capacity of about 100 liters per day on thermosyphon with necessary electrical back-up be installed at residential buildings like hostels.
section: Special Provisions; for installation of Solar Water Heating (SWH) Systems.

source_pdf.text_snippet: It is suggested that SWH systems of the capacity of about 100 liters per day on thermosyphon with necessary electrical back-up be installed at residential buildings like hostels.
